Aspartame is an artificial chemical sweetener (over 200 times sweeter than sugar) made by the Monsanto Corporation and is marketed as “NutraSweet,” “Equal,” “Spoonful” and countless other trade names. Although aspartame is added to over 9,000 food products, it is not fit for human consumption! Italian Researchers have discovered a link between Leukemia and Aspartame. Dr, John Olney at Washington University in St. Louis verified that high doses of Aspartame caused brain tumors in mice. Brain tumor rates have significantly risen in recent decades.

Comment by David J. Stewart... I suffer from all of the following symptoms and couldn't help but try this product in hope of some relief. Both of my arms tingle, burn, feel puffy and feel weak all the time. I took this product daily for months, but it didn't help me. The product may help you if your neuropathy is caused by diabetes or some other curable form of neuropathy.

Reduces nerve compression that causes pain, tingling, burning, numbness and peripheral neuropathy. NerveFix offers a researched blend of homeopathic remedies with supplement support that has received great results with customers. Nerve Fix helps with back sciatica, facial Trigeminal Neuralgia, and tingling sensations. NerveFix is well suited for pin and needles sensations in the toes, burning feet and restless legs.
